about_the_game:
Let the dark side rule with this new Hellish pack by Michael Galefire! This pack contains 7 new amazingly detailed Hellish Demon battlers for your heroes to battle against and 8 unique fiery, netherworld battlebacks (4 walls, 4 floors)

Features:

* Battler includes: Cyberbrute, Hellbrute, Demonic Sorcerer, Flame Imp, Imp, Hellknight, and Hellmaw; or name them whatever you want!
* Battlebacks include: 2 daemonic realms with wall variations, mountainous region with cave wall variant, and a volcanic region with a volcanic cave wall variant

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Demon Realm Battlepack" and "RPG Maker MV - Demon Realm Battlepack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
